segments.text: Look , Jim . That man just fell down over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We better see if he ’ s o . k .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir ... sir ? Are you all right ? Sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s not answering . You ’ d better check his pulse and breathing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . He ’ s not breathing , and there ’ s no pulse . Call 911 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello ? Yes . Someone has passed out at Connecticut Ave . and 1st St . He isn ’ t breathing and does not have a pulse . Yes . My friend is performing CPR . OK . Thank you . They ’ re sending an ambulance . Here , let me help .
segments.speaker: S2
